parameters.name: PointAt
parameters.description: Command ID for SOLIDWORKS toolbar button as defined in swCommands_e

parameters.name: LocX
parameters.description: x coordinate of the center of the specified SOLIDWORKS toolbar button

parameters.name: LocY
parameters.description: y coordinate of the center of the specified SOLIDWORKS toolbar button

title: ISldWorks.GetButtonPosition
description: Gets the center coordinates of the specified SOLIDWORKS toolbar button.
signature:
System.Boolean GetButtonPosition( 
   System.Int32
PointAt
,
   out System.Int32
LocX
,
   out System.Int32
LocY
)

parameters.name: PointAt
parameters.description: Command ID for SOLIDWORKS toolbar button as defined in swCommands_e

parameters.name: LocX
parameters.description: x coordinate of the center of the specified SOLIDWORKS toolbar button

parameters.name: LocY
parameters.description: y coordinate of the center of the specified SOLIDWORKS toolbar button

returns: True if method call is successful, false if not
